Message.Title: Operational Cash Flow Growth
Message.Msg: EBAY increased Q3 Operational Cash Flow by $345 million vs. Q3 2011. An increase of 43% ! wow. Strong buy

Message.Title: Buy. We were 50.46 minutes ago!!!!! down for no reason!
is ebay the sellers compeditor ??? looks like ebay taking sales from the sellers? i did not know ebay owns this company that packs orders
Message.Msg: A company with operations in Richwood is holding a two-day job fair to fill more than 1,700 seasonal positions, Fox 19 reported. GSI Commerce, a division of eBay Inc., is looking to fill temporary positions including pickers, packers, shippers, senior leads, and supervisors to get ready for holiday demand. Some of the positions could lead to full-time employment.

Message.Title: Yahoo raised Ebay target again to $54.20 Tuesday
Message.Msg: Yahoo raised Ebay target again to $54.20 Tuesday, Target will be 55.00 next week. Ebayt is going to $$$ 60++ by the end of this year.

Message.Title: Gene Munster says $65 price target, says it's a strong buy.
